title: Supreme Court Could Undercut Biden's Climate Agenda
itunes:title: Supreme Court Could Undercut Biden's Climate Agenda
description:
Pat Parenteau, a professor of environmental law at Vermont Law School, discusses Supreme Court oral arguments in which justices debated putting new limits on the Environmental Protection Agency’s power to tackle greenhouse-gas emissions.

Chase Kaniecki, a partner at Cleary Gottlieb, discusses how American companies are dealing with the Russian sanctions.

June Grasso hosts

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
